title: Compact, centered active-session controls on meditation page

requirements.summary: Center the active-session UI (canvas + timer + controls) as one grouped block within the viewport, limited to the specified elements.
acceptanceCriteria: When viewing the meditation active-session area, the selected canvas + timer + sliders + play/pause controls appear visually centered as one grouped block (not individually centered within separate columns).
No other non-selected page sections change alignment/position as a side effect.

file_operations.description: Adjust layout classes/styles ONLY on the existing canvas container, controls container, and timer element that correspond to the provided XPaths so that the active-session UI is visually centered as a single grouped block (e.g., ensuring the two sub-blocks don’t space out into separate columns and the group’s overall width is constrained and centered). Avoid changing unrelated sections (setup/reflection) and do not refactor surrounding layout structure.

Add optional styling hooks (e.g., optional className / style props) to allow PreMeditationPage to apply centering-related tweaks specifically to the rendered canvas and its immediate container context without affecting other usages. Ensure any adjustments can be scoped so only the canvas used in the active-session area is impacted.

requirements.summary: Reduce the play/pause button container size by at least 2× while keeping the icon size unchanged, limited to the specified button.
acceptanceCriteria: The clickable container of the play/pause button is visibly at least 2× smaller than before (e.g., reduced padding and/or fixed dimensions), but the icon glyph renders at the same size as before.
The button remains fully functional and accessible (still clickable/tappable; focus styles remain visible).
Only the selected play/pause button element is resized; other buttons/icons elsewhere are unaffected.

file_operations.description: Update ONLY the active-session play/pause button element (matching the provided XPath) to reduce its container sizing by at least 2× (e.g., smaller padding and/or fixed width/height) while leaving the Play/Pause icon component sizing classes unchanged. Preserve accessible focus styling and click/tap behavior; do not change other buttons.

requirements.summary: Make the active-session timer display slightly smaller, limited to the specified timer element.
acceptanceCriteria: The timer text/visual is reduced slightly (not dramatically) compared to the current UI, maintaining readability and hierarchy.
No other text elements outside the selected timer element change size.

file_operations.description: Adjust ONLY the timer display element (matching the provided XPath) to reduce its font size modestly (and related line-height if needed) while keeping readability. Ensure the change is scoped so no other text elements on the page are affected.

requirements.summary: Moderately reduce vertical spacing within the active-session controls container so time and volume sliders are closer, limited to the specified controls container.
acceptanceCriteria: The vertical gap between the time slider area and the volume slider area inside the selected controls container is reduced to a moderate, visually compact spacing (clearly smaller than before, but not cramped).
Spacing reductions are limited to the selected controls container; spacing elsewhere on the page is unchanged.

file_operations.description: Reduce vertical spacing ONLY inside the active-session controls container (matching the provided XPath) by adjusting its internal gap/spacing utilities (e.g., lowering space-y/gap values) so the time and volume slider sections sit closer together without becoming cramped. Ensure no other page spacing/layout is impacted.
